active_learning.ent_active_learner module¶

class active_learning.ent_active_learner.EntropyActiveLearner(model, labeler, batch_size=10, max_iter=50)[source]¶

Bases: object

train(fvs, seeds)[source]¶

run active learning

Parameters:

  • fvs (pyspark.sql.DataFrame) – the feature vectors for training, schema must contain (_id Any, id1 long, id2 long, features array<double or float>)

  • start_ids (List of _id) – the ids of the seed feature vectors for starting active learning, these must be present in fvs
